root.name: Family & Friends Party
root.description: The goal is to be the first to complete a series of challenges. During each turn, a challenge will be played by 1 or 2 players per team depending on the challenge you've been given. There are six different "Single" challenges that must be played cooperatively by members of the same team.There is also aÂ "Versus" challenges, which must be played competitively by all teams at the same time.Price: 1,000 Nintendo Points ($10)
